kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the given ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until element ``locator`` appears on current page.

kw.doc: Selects options from selection list ``locator`` by ``labels``.
kw.msg: Selecting options from selection list 'id=selectProductSort' by label Price: Lowest first.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on current page.

kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains ``text``.

kw.name: Locator Should Match X Times
kw.doc: Deprecated, use `Page Should Contain Element` with ``limit`` argument instead.
